feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.127.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: secret scanning self hosted documentation by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3548
  • misc: removed unnecessary key encryption for service token by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3556
  • feat(admin): Invalidate Cache by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3528
  • feat: adjustments to properties and validation by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3554
  • misc: add default old space config by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3560
  • feat(k8s): generator support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3540
  • Update Helm chart to version v0.9.2 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3561
  • Improvements: Refactor Project Templates and Project Type Policy Filtering/Specific Roles by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3550
  • docs(k8s/generators): improve documentation by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3564
  • improvement(project-roles): Add Policy Selection Modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3563
  • Remove unused migration folder by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3565
  • small migration fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3568
  • docs(identities): ldap auth by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.126.0-postgres...infisical/v0.127.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.127.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: resolved esm error in octokit by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3575

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.127.0-postgres...infisical/v0.127.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.127.2-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(api): Rate limit for all email-sending endpoints by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3576
  • feat(docs): Support OpenAPI titles for Zod descriptions by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3577
  • improvement(project-templates): Project templates UI improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3578
  • fix(workflow-integrations): microsoft teams scaling issues by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3579
  • feat(ssh-hosts): Add groups to ssh hosts allowed principals by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.127.1-postgres...infisical/v0.127.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical:
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvements(org-settings): Refactor Organization Security Settings to SSO Page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3584
  • Fix approval request ordering by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3587
  • Infisical PKI: Subscriber Functionality by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3569
  • misc: updated org delete flow to clear session by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3589
  • feat: added new cache control for index html by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3591
  • lint fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3592
  • feat(secret-sync): OCI Vault by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3567
  • feat(docs): Docs for self approval by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3585
  • feature(project-roles): Project Role Templates by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3570
  • Fixed project roles not being editable in some cases by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3593

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.41.2...infisical/v0.128.0-postgres
